title: Is molecular gastronomy the future of fine dining?
body: From foams to spherification, molecular techniques are revolutionizing how we experience food. But is this innovation or just culinary gimmickry?
author: seed

replies.author: thomas_keller
replies.content: As someone who values the fundamentals of cooking, I believe molecular gastronomy presents an opportunity for creativity and exploration in fine dining while still respecting traditional techniques; it's not a replacement but rather a complementary evolution that can enhance our culinary experiences.
